categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic military bases

nodes.text: A Rebel base was on Cardooine early in the Galactic Civil War. The starfighter unit Soaring Dactillions was assigned there at one time to test the A-wing prototype. It was assaulted by the Galactic Empire but the action was stymied by the actions of the tech expert Tendaar Bel. The Dactillions took heavy casualties in the battle.
The base was mentioned in Zal Artha and Tendaar Bel's Character Folios included with Fantasy Flight Games' 2014 roleplaying game Star Wars: Age of Rebellion Beginner Game.
